title: Countries with the lowest inflation rate 2019
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Inflation rate compared to previous year in each Country on the y axis.
The Inflation rate compared to previous year is highest at Country Eritrea and lowest at Country Panama.
The highest value at Country Eritrea is 2760.0x times more than the lowest value at Panama.
min_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Inflation rate compared to previous year in each Country on the y axis.
The Inflation rate compared to previous year is highest at Country Eritrea and lowest at Country Panama.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Inflation rate compared to previous year in each Country on the y axis.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Inflation rate compared to previous year in the y axis.
The Inflation rate compared to previous year is highest at Country Eritrea and lowest at Country Panama.
Second maximum Inflation rate compared to previous year is found at Country Guinea-Bissau.
There is a difference of 27.59 between the maximum Country Eritrea and minimum Country Panama.
Country Eritrea is higher than any other Countrys with value 27.6, followed by Guinea-Bissau, and United Arab Emirates. Down to Country Panama with the lowest value 0.01.
Country Switzerland, and Marshall Islands have the same Inflation rate compared to previous year.
The Country Panama has 13.99 times less Inflation rate compared to previous year than average.
